definition.name: BaseDef
definition.description: template.jsp controls the order in which page components are output and which components are nested in which structural DIV tags. Individual pages may be customised by overriding the various definitions referred to by the 'put' tags. CSS can, to some extent, be used to re-position components, however, some re-arrangements may require a replacement template.jsp, or post processing of the generated XHTML.

definition.name: AssignNewMembersDef
definition.description: Page which shows a set of privileges and a list of Subjects. The privileges depend on whether the target is a group or a stem. The list of Subjects may be the result of a search, in which case the results will be paged. Alternatively, the subjects may have been selected whilst browsing, in which case the list will not need to be paged, however, all the subjects will be checked.

definition.name: contentDef
definition.description: Wrapper which inserts the 'content' attribute into the page. The wrapper can be redefined to allow sites to add extra XHTML around the page specific content, or to re-arrange the page specific output.

definition.name: EditorDef
definition.description: A popup window which immediately closes. Part of the debug mechanism - if dynamic tiles are shown and a JSP editor defined, JSP file names are popup links to an action whch launches the editor. The idea is that the underlying page does not refresh when a link is clicked.

definition.name: HelpDef
definition.description: The help page. Includes getting started info and general help. This text is not derived from ResourceBundles as it makes more sense for a site to override the whole JSP pages.

definition.name: CreateGroupsDef
definition.description: Main page for the 'Create' browse mode

definition.name: EditGroupDef
definition.description: Form for creating new groups or editing existing ones.

definition.name: EditStemDef
definition.description: Form for creating newstems or editing existing ones.

definition.name: DebugPrefsDef
definition.description: Form for saving debug preferences.

definition.name: FindNewMembersDef
definition.description: Browse tree / search screen for finding members

definition.name: GroupMemberDef
definition.description: Form which allows user to change an individual Subject`s membership of / privileges for, the active group

definition.name: GroupMembersDef
definition.description: Displays (filtered and paged if necessary) list of current group members with links to edit individual members

definition.name: GroupPriviligeesDef
definition.description: Displays list of Subjects with selected privilege, with links to edit privileges for individual Subjects

definition.name: StemPriviligeesDef
definition.description: Displays list of Subjects with selected privilege, with links to edit privileges for individual Subjects

definition.name: GroupSummaryDef
definition.description: Displays summary of a group and provides links for the maintenance of the group

definition.name: IndexDef
definition.description: Splash page for unauthenticated users, Displays getting started info and a login link

definition.name: JoinGroupsDef
definition.description: Main page for the 'Join' browse mode

definition.name: ManageGroupsDef
definition.description: Main page for the 'Manage' browse mode

definition.name: MyGroupsDef
definition.description: Main page for the 'default' browse mode - My memberships

definition.name: AllGroupsDef
definition.description: Main page for the 'All' browse mode

definition.name: SearchGroupResultsDef
definition.description: Displays search results when searching for groups in all modes except 'Find' mode

definition.name: SearchStemResultsDef
definition.description: Displays search results when searching for stems

definition.name: StemMemberDef
definition.description: Form which allows user to change an individual Subject`s membership of / privileges for, the active stem

definition.name: browseStemsDef
definition.description: Tile which is embedded in other pages - displays child stems and groups of the active stem

definition.name: browseStemsFindDef
definition.description: Tile which is embedded in other pages - displays child stems and groups and group memberships of the curent node

definition.name: dynamicTileDef
definition.description: Tile which is configured to load dynamic tiles based on a 'view' and a 'viewObject'

definition.name: groupMemberPrivsDef
definition.description: Form embedded in another page which allows a Subject`s membership / privileges for the active group to be changed

definition.name: stemMemberPrivsDef
definition.description: Form embedded in another page which allows a Subject`s privileges for the active stem to be changed

definition.name: footerDef
definition.description: Standard tile used in baseDef which appears at the bottom of all pages unless otherwise configured

definition.name: headDef
definition.description: Tile which provides contents for HEAD tags on all pages derived from baseDef unless overridden

definition.name: headerDef
definition.description: Standard tile used in baseDef which appears at the top of all pages unless otherwise configured

definition.name: initDef
definition.description: Ensures that session is initialised with ResourceBundles. May be called even when not needed - so must review

definition.name: leftDef
definition.description: Standard tile used in baseDef which appears at the left of all pages unless otherwise configured. Currently contains the menu and can be 'relocated' to the menu bar by CSS - should separateso that left and menu are not one and same

definition.name: messageDef
definition.description: Standard tile used in baseDef which appears above the content space and renders any Message object assigned to the request attribute key 'message'

definition.name: initialStemsDef
definition.description: Tile inserted in browseStemsDef if an InitialStems plugin is defined and that mode is selected

definition.name: rightDef
definition.description: Standard tile used in baseDef which appears at the right of all page - empty in the standard UI

definition.name: stemLinksDef
definition.description: Tile which displays a standard set of stem management links based on the privileges of the current user for the current stem

definition.name: gettingStartedDef
definition.description: Tile which gives a basic introduction to Grouper - used on the splash page and on the help page

definition.name: groupLinksDef
definition.description: Tile which displays a standard set of group management links based on the privileges of the current user for the current group

definition.name: subheaderDef
definition.description: Stanard tile which displays a menu bar below the header

definition.name: titleDef
definition.description: Standard tile which displays a page title and possibly subtitle below the subheader

definition.name: flattenDef
definition.description: Standard tile which displays links which allow a user to show initial stems (if configured) and toggle whether to show the group hierarchy or a flat list of groups or stems

definition.name: searchFromDef
definition.description: Tile which displays a select list of parent stems to scope a search to a branch of the groups hierarchy

definition.name: showStemsLocationDef
definition.description: Tile which displays a list of parent stems to show the location of the current group or stem. The stem names are not links

definition.name: simpleSearchGroupsDef
definition.description: Tile which displays the simple search form for groups

definition.name: advancedSearchGroupsDef
definition.description: Tile which displays the advanced search form for groups

definition.name: simpleSearchStemsDef
definition.description: Tile which displays the simple search form for stems

definition.name: advancedSearchStemsDef
definition.description: Tile which displays the advanced search form for stems

definition.name: simpleSearchDef
definition.description: Tile which displays the simple search form for people and groups

definition.name: changeMembershipScopeDef
definition.description: Tile which displays a form which allows a user to change whether only immediate, or only effective or all members of the active group should be displayed

definition.name: selectGroupPrivilegeDef
definition.description: Tile which displays a form which allows a user to select a group privilege and see a list of Subjects with that privilege for the active group

definition.name: selectStemPrivilegeDef
definition.description: Tile which displays a form which allows a user to select a stem privilege and see a list of Subjects with that privilege for the active stem

definition.name: groupInfoDef
definition.description: Tile which displays a summary of group attributes - currently inserted in GroupSummaryDef

definition.name: emptyDef
definition.description: Tile with no content - used as a place holder where content may be needed in future or added in site specific way

definition.name: 401Def
definition.description: Not sure this is still used

definition.name: ErrorDef
definition.description: Page displayed if uncaught exception thrown

definition.name: generalHelpDef
definition.description: Tile which displays general help about the UI

definition.name: groupStuffDef
definition.description: Placeholder sites can redefine to add their own content e.g. links to other systems integrated with Grouper.

definition.name: failedRevocationsDef
definition.description: Tile which lists any privileges the user attempted to revoke - but which failed

definition.name: debugDef
definition.description: Tile which displays debug information if dbug mode is on
